kba.description: Select security question(s) below. These questions will help us verify your identity if you forget your password.
kba.question: Question

sideMenu.selectIcon: Please select icon in admin (Managed Object) settings

workflow.noAssignedTasks: No assigned tasks at this time
workflow.noGroupTasks: Your group has no tasks at this time

notFound.couldNotFind: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

dashboard.noWidgetSubText: Don't worry, you still have a profile.

welcome.welcomeMessage: The ForgeRock End User UI helps users manage their account data, consent, and shared resources.

authenticationDevices.title: 2-Step/Push Authentication
authenticationDevices.subtitle: View devices used for 2-step verification or push authentication for your account.
authenticationDevices.deleteModalText: You will not be able to authenticate using this device and may result in you getting locked out of your account if you rely solely on this device.
authenticationDevices.unableToEditModalText: Unable to edit this device name. Please sign in with this device in order to edit it.
authenticationDevices.unableToDeleteModalText: Unable to delete this device. Please sign in with this device in order to delete it.

accountControls.title: Account Controls
accountControls.subtitle: Download or delete your account data.
accountControls.deleteSubtitle: Permanently delete all your account data.
accountControls.deleteModalBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account data?
accountControls.downloadSubtitle: Download your account profile data, including personal information, account activity, device data, privacy and consent agreements.

social.title: Social Sign In
social.subtitle: Sign-in to your account using social identity providers.
social.deleteModalBody: Are you sure you want to disconnect {providerName} as a social identity provider?
social.disconnectError: Error disconnecting {providerName} as a social identity provider.

oauthApplications.title: Authorized Applications
oauthApplications.subtitle: These apps can access your account.
oauthApplications.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove '{applicationName}' from your list of authorized applications?

trustedDevices.title: Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.subtitle: Devices that have accessed your account.
trustedDevices.removeModalText: This will remove access to your account from the device.

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.subtitle: Update your username, password and secondary methods to protect your account.

consent.confirmDeny: {mappingName} will no longer have access to your data.
consent.subtitle: Control how your data is shared with third parties.
consent.title: Personal Data Sharing

activity.Authorisation_Request_Denied: You denied the request from {requestingParty} to access
activity.Authorisation_Request_Approved: You approved the request from {requestingParty} to access

resources.warningMessage: Sharing disabled. You'll still keep a copy.
resources.sameShareError: Cannot reshare resource with {requestingParty}.  Unshare with requesting party before changing permissions

deleteResource.title: Delete {resource}?
deleteResource.body: Are you sure you want to delete this {resource}?
